sentences.en: Andy has a fever and won’t be coming into work today.
sentences.cn: 安迪发烧了，今天不来上班。

sentences.en: Angie waited in a fever of excitement.
sentences.cn: 安吉在极度兴奋中等待着。

sentences.en: During fever a large quantity of fluid is lost in perspiration.
sentences.cn: 发烧时，大量水分会通过排汗而丧失。

sentences.en: Evans had rheumatic fever, missed school and fell behind.
sentences.cn: 伊万斯得了风湿热，没去上课，功课也落下了。

sentences.en: Frances kept talking, her mind at fever pitch.
sentences.cn: 弗朗西丝不停地说着，头脑处于极度兴奋状态。

sentences.en: Hay fever is an affliction which arrives at an early age.
sentences.cn: 枯草热是年纪较小时会患的一种病。

sentences.en: He was miraculously healed of a severe fever.
sentences.cn: 他的高烧奇迹般地退了。

sentences.en: I had glandular fever and spent that year feeling rotten.
sentences.cn: 我得了腺热，那一整年都不舒服。

sentences.en: I woke up this morning with a fever and an upset stomach.
sentences.cn: 今天早上醒来时我发烧了，胃也不舒服。

sentences.en: Rainy weather brings blessed relief to hay fever victims.
sentences.cn: 雨天会给枯草热患者带来欣喜，减轻他们的痛苦。
猩红热的接触传染性很强。

sentences.en: She's a victim of the dreaded hay fever.
sentences.cn: 她患上了花粉热这种讨厌的病症。

sentences.en: She’s running a fever (= has a fever ) .
Soccer fever has been sweeping the nation as they prepare for the World Cup.
sentences.cn: 世界杯筹备期间，足球狂潮席卷全国。

sentences.en: Symptoms are a slight fever, headache and loss of appetite.
sentences.cn: 症状包括低烧、头痛和食欲不振。

sentences.en: Symptoms of the disease include fever and weight loss.
sentences.cn: 这种疾病的症状包括发烧和体重减轻。

sentences.en: The little girl is running a fever and she needs help.
sentences.cn: 这个小女孩发烧了，需要帮助。

sentences.en: The symptoms include skin rashes, fever, and painful joints.
sentences.cn: 病症包括皮疹、发烧和关节疼痛。

sentences.en: They develop a fever and a watery discharge from their eyes.
sentences.cn: 他们开始发烧，眼睛里分泌出一种水状物。

words.tran_cn: 发热；高度兴奋（fever的过去式和过去分词）

trans.tran_en: an illness or a medical condition in which you have a very high temperature
